data.description:
Unichat is Your Ultimate Choice for VR Meet-Up! 

- Add and meet friends in just 5 seconds! And our MR mode keeps your friends with you in the real world.
- Get ready for encounters at virtual bars, making new friends whenever and wherever. Join public rooms for a variety of exciting activities.
- Dive into lively chats with AI friends, each with a unique personality, always online, ready to be your confidant.

Feeling a bit lost? No worries! We've got an array of social features at your disposal. Use the 3D brush for a game of "Guess the Drawing," watch sports games together via the browser, or enjoy TikTok and YouTube videos with fascinating strangers. Want to party? Dive into Gomuku and chat card games. Our rich, user-friendly app components guarantee your chat experience is anything but dull.

Join Unichat right now, where distance is a mere afterthought and friendship knows no bounds.

changelog.change_log:
We are excited to announce major updates to Unichat, enhancing it as the ultimate AI companion app with new features.
Key Changes:
1. Social Features:
  ·  Removed non-AI social features to improve performance.
  ·   Focus is now on AI character interaction.
  ·  Core social features won’t return but may be developed in a separate app.

2. Character Stories:
  ·  Added a few stories (under Neighbor and Roommate).
  ·   Will add more stories in the next update.

3. Character Names:
To maintain storyline consistency, we need to standardize AI names. We apologize if this means changing your existing AI characters' names. If this is a big issue for you, please let us know. Here are the new standardized names:
   ·  Roommate – Lily Johnson
   ·  Caretaker – Emma Taylor
   ·  Nurse Neighbor – Scarlett Brown
   ·  House Wife – Diana Sterling
   ·  Celebrity – Sophia Lin
   ·  Blind date – Noah Parker
   ·  Tina – Tina Bennett (released as a standard character)
   ·  Molly – Molly Wilson (future release)

4. Subscription (Coming Soon):
 ·  Introducing monthly subscriptions with two tiers:
   ·  Tier 1: $15/month – 150 Chat Energy/day
   ·  Tier 2: $25/month – 300 Chat Energy/day
 ·  Energy resets monthly, with additional purchases available.
 ·  Extra features for subscribers will include movement control panel, hot scenes, dance viewing, AI follow mode, and more.
We value your support and feedback. Join our Discord to share your thoughts!

New Feature:
1. A simple movement: Say "Come to me" and the AIs will walk to you. But you may need to try several times.
Bug Fix：
1. Failure of creating room under topic "Chat Bar"
2. Stucking in the topic page after play the Avatar Message
3. Errors with "Pinch" gesture when using controllers
4. Correct 3 inappropriate toasts
